name: Rough Ship
description:
As Captain of the LD-Rough Ship you must keep your ship running til you reach your destination. Trying to secure the future for your people, you decided to undertake a risky mission, transporting "The Item" to your home planet to rebuild your world. The journey is full of many dangers, Good luck. 

CONTROLS: 

W-A-S-D - Movement.

Left Mouse - Shoot. 

R - Reload.

E - Interact.

Left Ctrl - Crouch.
